description: The layout for the admin page controler class
permalink: The permalink of the page, shows as .html in the cache folder
title: The Title of the page
meta: array of objects for the meta info
css: array of objects for the css
js: array of objetcs for the js
headJs: array of objects for js in the head
container: The template for the page container, .htm
head: The template for the header of the page, .htm
menu: The template for the menu of the page, .htm
body: The template for the body of the page, .htm
foot: The template for the footer of the page, .htm

contents.filename: The file name of the contents
contents.name: The title of the contents

extraTags.name: The name of the tag to replace
extraTags.content: The content of the tag to replace

data: The default data to be sent to the page, rendered with angular
